title: Evaluation of Transit Systems' Robustness under Service Disruptions
description: A paper studying the robustness of transit systems under the context of service disruptions using network theory.

title: srt2text
description: A Python program that converts subtitles files into text files and has a variety of formatting options.

title: Exponent Law Program
description: An educational application that teaches the concepts of exponent laws and guides users through sample problems in a choose-your-adventure style.

title: Landmark Photo Gallery
description: A gallery that updates in real time and describes detected landmarks and other objects in added photos using machine learning and computer vision. [MakeUofT 2020 Submission]

title: Breezy Refill Menu
description: A command-line interface that accepts codes from users to both notify a pharmacy of a refill request and sends out a confirmation email. [Lassonde Games 2021 Submission]

title: Sudoku Exposer
description: A web app that can solve your sudoku board for you and has intuitive input options, making it natural to use.
